name: Adventure Map Glacier National Park - Rogers Pass & Area Wi
categories: Glacier National Park - Rogers Pass& Area Wi
description: A 1:50,000-scale 25-metre topographical map aimed at skiers, snowboarders and snowshoers stoked to get out to the Rogers Pass and Glacier National Park area. Includes all the Winter Permit Areas, permitted parking areas, Trans Canada Highway no-stopping zones, popular run and route locations, lots of info about avalanche safety, and a bunch of pretty cool and inspirational photos. Vetted by Park authorities and waterproof for days in the snow and sun.
